TextBlock.Text: KOUSA: The perpetual storm shelter has been constructed, Idaea!
KOUSA: You may see this modified storm shelter currently active within the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color> below us.
IDAEA: You have my deepest gratitude, Kousa.. I was not sure if it would even be possible to build a storm shelter that was active perpetually!
KOUSA: Of course, but.. Why did you wish to build a perpetual storm shelter on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon,</color> young one?
IDAEA: Ah, I was reminded of your invention during a recent visit to <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep.</color> I was truly impressed how they were able to protect Nomai from even the fiercest winds.
IDAEA: From what I know, our elders have long been unable to escape the sixth location because of impossibly strong winds surrounding the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon's</color> skies.
IDAEA: I hoped that if a storm shelter were built on the sixth location, perhaps it might allow us to escape the strong winds surrounding the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> there.
KOUSA: Young Idaea... How.. How have I never thought of that?
KOUSA: Yes, yes... If this plan works, we may be able to reach our goals without ever putting the star system at risk!
KOUSA: I must make preparations to set off for the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> at once. Will you accompany me, Idaea?
IDAEA: I wish I could.. But I must return to my work on the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> shortly..
IDAEA: Would you kindly write to the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> using the projection wall when you return, Kousa?
KOUSA: Of course, my friend. I shall update you from the projection wall within the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color> upon my return!
IDAEA: You have my gratitude, my friend! Be curious on your journey.
